sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="text" id="datepicker" class="form-control" />
</template>

<script>
import $ from "jquery"
export default {
    name: "MyDatepicker",
    mounted() {
        this.getDatepicker();
    },
    methods: {
        getDatepicker() {
            $(document).ready(function() {
                $('#datepicker').on('click', () => {
                    $('#datepicker').datepicker({
                        format: "dd/mm/yyyy",
                        autoclose: true,
                        toggleActive: true,
                    });
                });
                $('#datepicker').change(() => {
                    this.$emit("onSelect",$('#datepicker').val());
                });
            });
        },
    }
}
</script>
